action.action-desc: Mr. Harder of California (for himself and Mr. Higgins of Louisiana) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend section 5 of the Flood Control Act of 1941 to impose a deadline for initiating the repair or restoration of project under such section, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Safeguarding Our Levees Act.
Section 5 of the Flood Control Act of 1941 (33 U.S.C. 701n(a)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (a) by adding at the end the following:

Not later than 180 days after receiving from a non-Federal sponsor of a project a request to repair or rehabilitate a flood control work described in paragraph (1), the Secretary shall initiate the repair or restoration of such flood control work.
